item.title: DIY Iced Tea
item.description: A few days ago I made my own Iced Tea and I thought I’d share this quick ‘n easy recipe on the blog. Ingredients for 1 liter Half a lemon A bit of Agave syrup (1-2 table spoon) 300ml fresh brewed black tea (I used a cheap Earl Grey) 700ml water (I used with gas, can also be without!) Steps Boil water and make black tea, let it sit for longer, we need it to be strong (~10-15min) Cut lemon and squeeze out juice Mix lemon and Black Tea, e.
